name: Charge Barrage (Updated)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

You're a rogue robot that's been overloaded with electricity while being made! Now you must escape the factory while a lockdown puts everything into a state of chaos! There are only five minutes until the factory shuts down, so hurry up & destroy the guard robots in each room to progress! However, your malfunctioning state causes you to switch your weapon erratically... good luck!

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move

Left Mouse Button: Use Weapon

CREDITS: 

FryDev: Code, Art, SFX

Centurion_of_war: Music ("Chipped urgency")

TinyWorlds: Font (Theleah Fat)
